cause.description:
Jonathan Tang has had erection problems for years, recently this has been found with accompanying symptoms of an inability to pee in a cup and the desire to deny that this ever occurred. We are here to help Tang by raising awareness of his problem and thus enabling many people to congratulate him on his handling of the problem, and allowing for him to continue his usage through funding of his addiction.
Jonathan, you CAN be a real man again.. it just takes time, and a lot of drugs. We are here to help.
1. Tang must get funding for his continual use of viagra
cause.mission: raise enough money and awareness to try and combat the problem on a physical and emotional level
cause.name: Subsidising Tang's necessary usage of high dose viagra
